content.description: ​Two function models <math alttext="k"><semantics><mi>k</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="m"><semantics><mi>m</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> are constructed to represent the sales of a product at a group of grocery stores. Both <math alttext="k open parentheses t close parentheses"> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>k</mi> <mfenced> <mi>t</mi> </mfenced> </mrow> <annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation> </semantics> </math> and <math alttext="m open parentheses t close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>m</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> represent the sales of the product, in thousands of units, after <math alttext="t"><semantics><mi>t</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> weeks for <math alttext="t greater or equal than 2"> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>t</mi> <mo>≥</mo> <mn>2</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation> </semantics> </math>.
content.question: If <math alttext="k open parentheses t close parentheses equals 14 minus 2.885 ln t"> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>k</mi> <mfenced> <mi>t</mi> </mfenced> <mo>=</mo> <mn>14</mn> <mo>-</mo> <mn>2.885</mn> <mi>ln</mi> <mpadded lspace="+1px"> <mi>t</mi> </mpadded> </mrow> <annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation> </semantics> </math> and <math alttext="m open parentheses t close parentheses equals negative t plus 14"> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>m</mi> <mfenced> <mi>t</mi> </mfenced> <mo>=</mo> <mo>-</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo>+</mo> <mn>14</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation> </semantics> </math>, what is the first time <math alttext="t"><semantics><mi>t</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> that sales predicted by the logarithmic model will be <math alttext="0.1"><semantics><mn>0.1</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> thousand units more than sales predicted by the linear model?

topic.text: 2.14: Logarithmic Function Context and Data Modeling

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Apply numerical results in a given mathematical or applied context.
